pr_title: SONARJAVA-3605 FP in S3305 when field has an initializer

timeline.bodyText: I'd suggest adding a case @Autowired private Bar withInitializer = new Bar(); (maybe to non-compiling examples if doesn't compile) and decide what we want to do in such case.
timeline.author: margarita-nedzelska-sonarsource

timeline.bodyText: As far as I remember Spring. @Autowired annotation by default has required = true. So the initializer won't make sense, because the project will fail if no @Bean found (or even won't compile). Maybe it will be nice to check that required=false there. On the other hand, it's an additional check, so maybe we can leave it as it is.
timeline.author: margarita-nedzelska-sonarsource

timeline.message: Migrate test file to compiled module for S3305
SONARJAVA-3605 FP in S3305 when field has an initializer
Supress issue only when required is set to false
Supress issue only when required is set to false
